Sql.query: select nvl(max(trnpctcodi), 0) + 1 from trn_potencia_contratada

insert into trn_potencia_contratada ( trnpctcodi, pericodi, emprcodi, coresocodi, TrnPctPtoSumins, TrnPctTotalMwFija, TrnPctHpMwFija, TrnPctHfpMwFija, TrnPctTotalMwVariable, TrnPctHpMwFijaVariable, TrnPctHfpMwFijaVariable, TrnPctComeObs, TrnPctUserNameIns, TrnPctFecIns) values ( :trnpctcodi, :pericodi, :emprcodi, :coresocodi, :TrnPctPtoSumins, :TrnPctTotalMwFija, :TrnPctHpMwFija, :TrnPctHfpMwFija, :TrnPctTotalMwVariable, :TrnPctHpMwFijaVariable, :TrnPctHfpMwFijaVariable, :TrnPctComeObs, :TrnPctUserNameIns, :TrnPctFecIns )
delete from trn_potencia_contratada where pericodi = :pericodi and emprcodi = :emprcodi

select crt.coresocodigo, crt.genemprcodi, crt.cliemprcodi, crt.tipconcodi, crt.tipusucodi, crt.barrcodi, crt.coresofechainicio, crt.coresofechafin, empgen.emprnomb as emprnomb, empcli.emprnomb as clinombre, bar.barrbarratransferencia, tc.tipconnombre, tu.tipusunombre, '' as perinombre, pc.* from trn_codigo_retiro_solicitud crt left outer join si_empresa empgen on (empgen.emprcodi = crt.genemprcodi) left outer join si_empresa empcli on (empcli.emprcodi = crt.cliemprcodi) inner join trn_barra bar on (bar.barrcodi = crt.barrcodi) inner join trn_tipo_contrato tc on (tc.tipconcodi = crt.tipconcodi) inner join trn_tipo_usuario tu on (tu.tipusucodi = crt.tipusucodi) left join trn_potencia_contratada pc on (crt.coresocodi= pc.coresocodi and pc.pericodi = :pericodi) where crt.coresoestado = 'ASI' and crt.coresoobservacion = 'SOLBAJANO' and (crt.genemprcodi = :emprcodi or 0 = :emprcodi) and (crt.cliemprcodi = :emprcodi or 0 = :emprcodi) and (crt.barrcodi = :barrcodi or 0 = :barrcodi) and NVL(to_char(crt.coresofechainicio, 'YYYYMM'), '000000') <= (select to_char(perianiomes) from trn_periodo where pericodi = :pericodi) and NVL(to_char(crt.coresofechafin, 'YYYYMM'), '999999') >= (select to_char(perianiomes) from trn_periodo where pericodi = :pericodi) order by empgen.emprnomb, empcli.emprnomb, bar.barrbarratransferencia, crt.coresocodigo

insert into trn_potencia_contratada (trnpctcodi, pericodi, emprcodi, coresocodi, trnpctptosumins, trnpcttotalmwfija, trnpcthpmwfija, trnpcthfpmwfija, trnpcttotalmwvariable, trnpcthpmwfijavariable, trnpcthfpmwfijavariable, trnpctcomeobs, trnpctusernameins, trnpctfecins) select (:trnpctcodi + rownum) as trnpctcodi, :pericodi, --emprcodi, nvl((select distinct v.emprcodidestino from sic.vw_si_migracion v where v.emprcodiorigen = pc.emprcodi or v.emprcodidestino = pc.emprcodi order by v.migracodi desc FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY),pc.emprcodi) emprcodi, coresocodi,trnpctptosumins, trnpcttotalmwfija, trnpcthpmwfija, trnpcthfpmwfija, trnpcttotalmwvariable, trnpcthpmwfijavariable, trnpcthfpmwfijavariable, trnpctcomeobs, :trnpctusernameins, sysdate from trn_potencia_contratada pc where pc.pericodi = :emprcodi order by trnpctcodi
delete from trn_potencia_contratada where pericodi = :pericodi

--============================================================ -- RECUPERAR SI LOS VTA Y SUS CODIGOS HIJOS ASOCIADOS --============================================================
SELECT AGRH.CORESOCODI ,AGRP.CORESOCODI CORESOCODIPARENT FROM TRN_POTENCIA_CONTRATADA AGRH INNER JOIN ( SELECT TRNPCAGRP ,CORESOCODI FROM TRN_POTENCIA_CONTRATADA WHERE CORESOCODI IN({0}) AND TRNPCESTADO='ACT' AND NVL(PERICODI,PERIDCCODI)={1} ) AGRP ON AGRH.TRNPCAGRP=AGRP.TRNPCAGRP ORDER BY TRNPCNUMORD ASC

select bsm.barrcodi, bsm.barrnombre, potcn.trnpctcodi as trnpctcodi, potcn.coresocodi as coresocodipotcn, potcn.coregecodi as coregecodipotcn, potcn.trnpcagrp as trnpcagrp, potcn.trnpcnumord as trnpcnumordm, potcn.trnpccodicas as trnpccodicas, potcn.trnpcttotalmwfija as trnpcttotalmwfija , potcn.trnpcthpmwfija as trnpcthpmwfija, potcn.trnpcthfpmwfija as trnpcthfpmwfija, potcn.trnpcttotalmwvariable as trnpcttotalmwvariable, potcn.trnpcthpmwfijavariable as trnpcthpmwfijavariable, potcn.trnpcthfpmwfijavariable as trnpcthfpmwfijavariable, casagr.TIPCASABREV as TIPCASABREV, CASE WHEN ptcnprimerVTA.coresocodi=potcn.coresocodi OR ptcnprimerVTA.coresocodi IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as esPrimerRegistro, potcn.trnpctptosumins from TRN_POTENCIA_CONTRATADA potcn left join VTP_TIPO_CASO_AGR casagr on potcn.TRNPCCODICAS= casagr.TIPCASCODI left join VTP_CODIGO_RETIRO_GENERADO codgene on potcn.coregecodi=codgene.coregecodi left join vtp_codigo_retiro_sol_det cdrt on codgene.coresdcodi=cdrt.coresdcodi left join trn_barra bsm on bsm.barrcodi = cdrt.barrcodisum left join TRN_POTENCIA_CONTRATADA ptcnprimerVTA on potcn.TRNPCAGRP=ptcnprimerVTA.TRNPCAGRP and ptcnprimerVTA.TRNPCNUMORD=1 where potcn.coresocodi = :coresocodi and potcn.trnpcEstado='ACT' and NVL(potcn.PERIDCCODI,potcn.PERICODI) =:pericodi

select bsm.barrcodi, bsm.barrnombre, potcn.trnpctcodi as trnpctcodi, potcn.coresocodi as coresocodipotcn, potcn.coregecodi as coregecodipotcn, potcn.trnpcagrp as trnpcagrp, potcn.trnpcnumord as trnpcnumordm, potcn.trnpccodicas as trnpccodicas, potcn.trnpcttotalmwfija as trnpcttotalmwfija , potcn.trnpcthpmwfija as trnpcthpmwfija, potcn.trnpcthfpmwfija as trnpcthfpmwfija, potcn.trnpcttotalmwvariable as trnpcttotalmwvariable, potcn.trnpcthpmwfijavariable as trnpcthpmwfijavariable, potcn.trnpcthfpmwfijavariable as trnpcthfpmwfijavariable, casagr.TIPCASABREV as TIPCASABREV, CASE WHEN ptcnprimerVTA.coresocodi=potcn.coresocodi OR ptcnprimerVTA.coresocodi IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as esPrimerRegistro, potcn.trnpctptosumins from TRN_POTENCIA_CONTRATADA_APR potcn left join VTP_TIPO_CASO_AGR casagr on potcn.TRNPCCODICAS= casagr.TIPCASCODI left join VTP_CODIGO_RETIRO_GENERADO codgene on potcn.coregecodi=codgene.coregecodi left join vtp_codigo_retiro_sol_det cdrt on codgene.coresdcodi=cdrt.coresdcodi left join trn_barra bsm on bsm.barrcodi = cdrt.barrcodisum left join TRN_POTENCIA_CONTRATADA ptcnprimerVTA on potcn.TRNPCAGRP=ptcnprimerVTA.TRNPCAGRP and ptcnprimerVTA.TRNPCNUMORD=1 where potcn.coresocodi = :coresocodi and potcn.trnpcEstado='ACT' and NVL(potcn.PERIDCCODI,potcn.PERICODI) =:pericodi
SELECT TrnPcEnvCodi ,TRNPCENVUSUARIO ,TRNPCENVFECHARE ,TRNPCENVHORARE FROM TRN_POTENCIA_CONTRATADA_ENVIOS WHERE PERICODI=:PERICODI
UPDATE trn_codigo_retiro_solicitud SET CORESOESTAPR='APR', COESUSERAPR=:TrnPctUsernameIns, CORESOFECAPR=SYSDATE WHERE CORESOCODI=:CoresoCodi AND CORESOESTAPR='PEN'
UPDATE trn_codigo_retiro_solicitud SET CORESOESTAPR='REC', COESUSERAPR=:TrnPctUsernameIns, CORESOFECAPR=SYSDATE WHERE CORESOCODI=:CoresoCodi AND CORESOESTAPR='PEN'

update trn_potencia_contratada set trnpcEstado='INA' ,TRNPCAGRP=NULL ,TRNPCNUMORD=NULL
,TRNPCCODICAS=NULL where coresocodi=:coresocodi and NVL(PERIDCCODI,PERICODI) =:pericodi

update trn_potencia_contratada set trnpcEstado='INA' ,TRNPCAGRP=NULL ,TRNPCNUMORD=NULL ,TRNPCCODICAS=NULL where coresocodi=:coresocodi and coregecodi=:coregecodi and NVL(PERIDCCODI,PERICODI) =:pericodi
